languages.text: {n}Ваши глаза открываются, вы вновь видите свет — и печальную Кибеллу.{/n} "Я напрасно оторвала тебя от дел, Домин'{name}. Прошу... возвращайся на свою стезю. Я обдумаю то, что произошло".
languages.translation_comment: Все эффекты спадают — Игрок и Кибелла стоят в склепе

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда с ваших глаз спадают оковы стежков, вы через некоторое время начинаете различать свет — и Кибеллу, с печалью взирающую на вас.{/n} "Я напрасно оторвала тебя от твоих дел, Эним'{name}. Прошу... возвращайся на свою стезю. Я обдумаю то, что сегодня произошло".

languages.translation_comment: Все эффекты спадают — Игрок и Кибелла стоят в склепе

languages.text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши глаза открываются, вы вновь видите свет — и печальную Кибеллу.{/n} "Я напрасно оторвала тебя от дел, Домин'{name}. Прошу... возвращайся на свою стезю. Я обдумаю то, что произошло".

traits.locale_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Enim'{name}. Please... Return to your way. I will think on what took place here."

{n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Enim'{name}. Please... Return to your way. I will think on what took place here."

{n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Enim'{name}. Please... return to your way. I will think upon all that took place here."

{n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Enim'{name}. Please... return to your way. I will think upon all that took place here."

{n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

{n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

languages.text: {n}Du öffnest die Augen und siehst wieder Licht ... und Kibellah, mit trauriger Miene.{/n} "Ich hätte Euch nicht von Eurer Arbeit ablenken sollen, Domin'{name}. Bitte ... kehrt zu Eurem Faden zurück. Ich werde über alles nachdenken, was hier geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du öffnest die Augen und siehst wieder Licht ... und Kibellah, mit trauriger Miene.{/n} "Ich hätte Euch nicht von Eurer Arbeit ablenken sollen, Domin'{name}. Bitte ... kehrt zu Eurem Faden zurück. Ich werde über alles nachdenken, was hier geschehen ist."

languages.text: {n}Abres los ojos y vuelves a ver la luz... y a Kibellah, con expresión triste.{/n} «No debería haberl{mf|e|a} distraído de sus funciones, Domin'{name}. Por favor... vuelva a su hilo. Yo meditaré sobre todo lo ocurrido aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abres los ojos y vuelves a ver la luz... y a Kibellah, con expresión triste.{/n} «No debería haberl{mf|e|a} distraído de sus funciones, Domin'{name}. Por favor... vuelva a su hilo. Yo meditaré sobre todo lo ocurrido aquí».

languages.text: {n}あなたが目を開くと、再び光が…そしてキベラが見えた。彼女は悲しげな表情をしている。{/n}「私は労苦からあなたの気をそらすべきじゃなかったわ、ドミン・{name}。どうか…自分の糸に戻ってちょうだい。私はここで起きたすべてについて、考えてみるわ」
languages.original_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが目を開くと、再び光が…そしてキベラが見えた。彼女は悲しげな表情をしている。{/n}「私は労苦からあなたの気をそらすべきじゃなかったわ、ドミン・{name}。どうか…自分の糸に戻ってちょうだい。私はここで起きたすべてについて、考えてみるわ」

languages.text: {n}你睁开了眼睛，再次看到了光明，也看到了满脸哀伤的绮贝菈。{/n}“我不该分散你的注意力，秘者{name}。请你……回到你的丝线上吧，我要仔细思考在这里发生的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}你睁开了眼睛，再次看到了光明，也看到了满脸哀伤的绮贝菈。{/n}“我不该分散你的注意力，秘者{name}。请你……回到你的丝线上吧，我要仔细思考在这里发生的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous ouvrez les yeux, Kibellah se tient devant vous, une expression attristée sur le visage.{/n} « Je n'aurais pas dû vous détourner de vos devoirs, Domin'{name}. Je vous en prie... Retournez à votre fil. Je vais réfléchir à ce qu'il s'est passé ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous ouvrez les yeux, Kibellah se tient devant vous, une expression attristée sur le visage.{/n} « Je n'aurais pas dû vous détourner de vos devoirs, Domin'{name}. Je vous en prie... Retournez à votre fil. Je vais réfléchir à ce qu'il s'est passé ici. »

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini açınca bir kez daha ışığı ve... Yüzüne hüzünlü bir ifade oturmuş Kibellah'yı görüyorsun.{/n} "Seni meşgalelerinden alıkoymamalıydım Domin'{name}. Lütfen... İpliğine geri dön. Burada yaşananlar üzerine düşüneceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}You open your eyes and see light once more — and Kibellah, wearing a saddened expression.{/n} "I should not have distracted you from your labours, Domin'{name}. Please... return to your thread. I will think upon all that took place here."
